Public NotInheritable Class ObjectAce Inherits QualifiedAce

summary.span: 控制对目录服务对象的访问权限。

span.span: Controls access to Directory Services objects.

summary.span: 此类表示与目录对象关联的访问控制项 (ACE)。

span.span: This class represents an Access Control Entry (ACE) associated with a directory object.
